name: 陸志成
objective:
The objectives of the school's physical education curriculum are to exercise and improve our body and mind, cultivate sports ethics, promote team spirit and develop lifelong sports habits. Freshman (first year student) implements the teaching of physical education in ordinary classes. Sophomore and junior (first and second year student) are required to choose and practice one of the sports in the followings description according to their own interests.

Soccer, basketball, volleyball, table tennis, badminton, bowling, archery, golf, tennis, gymnastics, softball, tai chi, international standard dance, physical fitness, national arts.
schedule:
Week 1       Warm-up and exercises        
Weeks 2 to 3   Analyze and practice of kicking movements    
Weeks 3 to 4   Analyze and practice of ball controls 
Weeks 5 to 6   Analyze and practice of shooting movements        
Week 7      Analysis and practice of dribbling             
Week 8      Analyze and practice of slide tackling    
Week 9      Rules discussion     
Week 10     Goal keeping practice     
Week 11     Ball-holding game                     
Week 12     Making opportunities to shoot   
Week 13     Turning skill Practice                   
Week 14     Crossover practice
Week 15     Two o'clock turn around practice                 
Week 16     End game practice  
Week 17     Defense practice              
Week 18     Final Quiz and Assessment
materials:
1. Soccer classroom
2. Soccer techniques and tactics
3. Rules of the Chinese Soccer Association
4. Perspective football coaching strategy analysis
